description: Complete system overview covering the email management system architecture, key components, and integration points with email providers
Detailed documentation of the multi-provider email synchronization algorithm, including delta-based sync, cursor pagination, and provider-specific optimizations
Comprehensive documentation of the email threading algorithm, including the multi-method detection system, confidence scoring, and cross-account thread linking
Documentation of the provider abstraction layer, including folder/label management, provider-specific handling, and unified data models across different email providers
End-to-end data flow documentation covering message processing, caching strategies, real-time updates, and cross-account data handling
